meanings.definition: To replace panels in (a piece of furniture or a room)
meanings.sent1: They repaneled the old cabinet to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter repaneled the walls of the room with fresh wood.
meanings.sent3: After the mishap, they repaneled the room with colorful panels for a cheerful vibe.
meanings.sent4: The artist repaneled the canvas of his painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers echoed as they repaneled the stage for the play.
